tool_description: A basic API that returns a random Kanye West quote.
name: KanyePI
title: KanyePI

api_list.name: Get Quote
api_list.description: The endpoint that will return a quote.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kanyepi.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanyepi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kanyepi.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanyepi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
